string.text: Mexaminum radiation protection drugs are common in the Zone. When used, this drug induces contraction of peripheral blood vessels and oxygen deprivation, which serves to treat and prevent radiation exposure. The drug does not have severe side effects, although isolated cases of mild nausea, dizziness, cramps and stomach pain have been reported.

A normal elastic bandage used to stop bleeding and prevent infection of wounds. For regular bleeding, carefully apply the bandage to the wound. For arterial bleeding, urgently tie the bandage around the affected area.
Standard issue military binoculars with a maximum of x7.5 magnification. Useful in the Zone in that they allow its owner to observe things from a distance.

A fine bread loaf baked by Nimble's wife who lives outside the Zone, this was the first item Nimble started to sell in the Zone. Now days he provide the Bar keepers with this fine bread instead of selling it him self as in the past, after all he has bigger things on his mind now.
A bread loaf baked outside the Zone.
100 pages of prime russian girls. A popular way of mentally getting away from The Zone for a moment
A joint calms and relaxes your mind in a very pleasant way with a soothing effect if you have alcohol in your blood. It also makes you hungry very fast. Joints are valuable in The Zone.
Cigarettes calms your nerves when you need to settle your mental state and fight your hunger in an alternative way. They are rare in The Zone and quite valuable.
You have studied this survival guide many times and believe that the only use now is some quick cash as stalkers might want to have this book when exploring this area.
Protein bars of this type are healthy and good meals when your body is in a constant active state. You can keep them for many days before they loose their chewy consistency.

Warning! Do not use in combination with ANY other drug. This powerful mixture packed in a small syringe knocks you down. But when you wake up (IF you wake up) you will feel reborn. Inject the syringe into your thigh when sitting down.
The date on the tin can indicates that you should except the tuna fish inside to be rather unappetizing.
2 small skewers of flame grilled tushkano meat flavored with salt and chili pepper. This is the cheapest hot meal that is cooked in the The Zone. Served in a slice of thick brown paper.
A small but hot meal of cooked dog chops blended with garlic, peppers and mushrooms. Served in an old tin box. A cheap alternative to the more popular boar beef.
Portion of cooked psuedodog meat chops. Good nutrition value due to dense muscle mass of the animal.
2 slices of fat and greasy bacon made from mutated pigs commonly known as Flesh. Served in a slice of thick brown paper.
A small flame grilled beef with added salt and peppers. The most popular meal among stalkers. Served in brown paper.
A small but hot meal made from bloodsucker flesh and chilis with added mushrooms. Served in a tin box.

The cut Snork hand has been grilled over open fire. WARNING: Most men in The Zone consider it a cannibalistic and immoral act to eat any part of a Snork! In spite of this some bandits and mercenaries are actually eating roasted Snork hands to signal a baddass superiority among their faction members.
A portion of Chimera beef cooked with mushrooms and spices. An expensive meal that is eaten by veteran stalkers only to celebrate succes and survival in The Zone.

This dated anomalous activity detector produces an alarm signal when anomalous particles enter a special chamber as you approach an anomaly. It can also register the presence of artifacts and measure the distance to the nearest one. The distance is indicated by the frequency of the sound the detector emits. To switch to artifact search mode, open the device's front cover. Due to its simple design, Echo can only be used to locate the most common artifacts.

A next generation scientific detection scanner. Thanks to three modernized detection chambers, the position of artifacts is shown on a special display screen. When closed, the device registers only radiation and anomalies. To switch to artifact search mode, open the front LED display. When in search mode, the detector is capable of locating all artifacts known to science.

A prototype of an expanded functionality anomalous frequency scanner. This device comes with a program used to identify static areas of anomalous activity stored in its database, while retaining the ability to locate artifacts. The position of anomalous areas and artifacts is displayed on a special screen. The artifact search mode, which can be activated by opening the front LED display, has been modified to detect anomalous formations currently unknown to science.
A standard head-mounted flashlight. Useful for stalkers who find themselves out and about after dark, but may attract trouble if used unwisely.

The IP2 antitoxin is a complex drug comprising several antidotes, including metoclopramidum, pyridoxine, thiamine, riboxin and other pharmaceuticals. The drug is used to inject a range of antibiotics to neutralize natural poisons, together with synthetic poison absorbers, into the bloodstream. IP2 is not particularly popular in the Zone, as most stalkers rely on a gas mask and a protective suit, there are still those who have a pack of this antidote stashed away. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.

Ukrainian Vikasolum - an artificial equivalent of vitamin K. The main purpose of this drug is to increase blood coagulation speed. In great demand among stalkers who want slow-healing wounds and lacerations inflicted by mutants to close up faster. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.

A drug that blocks avalanche-like nerve impulses. Consumption induces short-term loss of all emotion. Used exclusively in the Zone to counteract the effects of anomalous psy-fields. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
Sparkling water for the thirsty Stalker, it has some exhilarated effect when you are tired.

Often used by stalkers on long trips, due to it's exhilarated effect when you are getting tired. The drink have also some "sobering up" effect if you have looked to deep in to the Vodka bottle as well it stimulate the release of adrenaline into the bloodstream. Do not overdose.
A package containing a mixture of old bread and some smelly pork meat wrapped in brown paper. The look and smell of this signals that some of it is rotten.

A specialized medical kit for providing first aid to combat casualties. The kit includes blood coagulants based on menadione, painkillers, antibiotics and immunostimulants, as well as a kit for removing bullets and fragments from the body. This medkit is issued to army personnel as standard and is sometimes used by Duty forces.
A general purpose single-use medical kit. Handy for treating injuries, wounds, chemical and thermal burns and various types of poisoning.

A medical kit designed specifically for use in the Zone. The kit contains products for handling wounds, as well as preventing the development of radiation poisoning and reducing accumulated radiation in the body. Contains Vikasolum, Batilolum and Naphazoline, unlike other medkits.
A package of small white sleeping pills that imediately will slow and ease your stressed mind. Eat 5 min before you want to rest and use water in combination for maximum effect.
PDA with information about the Zone, digital logs and detailed maps over the Zone and it's anomaly's. Trading value could be high for this if you find the right person.

Cossacks Vodka imported to the zone. Goes down easy and considerably lowers the effects of radiation. Should be enjoyed in moderation. The bottles are used to shots of vodka and a often either refilled or emptied completely at stalker camps.

This last generation anomalous activity detector can be used to locate anomalous formations and has a color diode panel, which not only indicates the direction of artifacts, but also measures the distance to them. To switch to artifact search mode, open the device's front cover. Unfortunately, the device is programmed with a somewhat outdated list of detectable artifacts.

An experimental drug developed by Professor Ozersky for scientific research teams working in the Zone. At its core, the drug contains tetrodotoxin, known colloquially as "zombie powder," which causes a complete shutdown of the body's central nervous system that may allow people to survive emissions outside cover. The drug has not undergone clinical or field testing, which puts its effectiveness in doubt and raises the issue of possible side effects.

The main component of this product is an anabolic androgen, an artificial steroid, the chemical composition of which resembles testosterone. Often used by stalkers during long raids to reduce muscle fatigue. Significantly increases weight-carrying capacity. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.

B190 Indraline radioprotectant, included in medkits issued to nuclear power plant personnel. Used in the Zone instead of the excessively toxic PC1 cystamine hydrochloride, repeated use of which often caused death. Reduces the effects of gamma radiation on live tissue. Best consumed before exposure, as effects are not instant. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
For blues and prison romance lovers.
A pack of fully charged batteries for the use of your flashlight, pda, nightvision goggles and other electronic devices. Remember to change regularly.

Beards popular hot tea made from a mixture of sugar, harmless dried mushrooms and boiled water that is said to be cleansed from radiation. Stalkers who are able to pay the price are buying this drink for long trips in The Zone. It's a good and healthy way to stay alert when you are getting tired or exploring during cold nights.

This kit contains oils, mechanical tools used for basic maintaining and some small weapon spare parts. All metal items required to fix a broken weapon or suit to a functioning condition if you know your way around weapon mechanics. It's a heavy kit but it can be very helpful when exploring deep into The Zone with basic equipment. 1 use = +35% condition (but anything above 85% requires a real mechanic/workshop).

This is your personal ID card which reveals your true identity (keep it hidden). As a USS Assaulter you are specialized in assault rifles, shotguns and heavy weapons. You are also specialized in the control of weapon recoil. Slow sprinting speed.

Trade in The Zone is mainly done through electronic transactions for safety and managing reasons. But many stalkers keep at least a few coins on them to be able to buy smaller things like cigarettes off each other. This minimizes economy management and conserves battery life.

Faction patches are often used to determine the rank of faction members as a high count is a strong symbol of great survival skills within The Zone. They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

Faction patches are often used to determine the rank of faction members as a high count is a strong symbol of great survival skills within The Zone. They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

Faction patches are often used to determine the rank of faction members as a high count is a strong symbol of great survival skills within The Zone. They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

Faction patches are often used to determine the rank of faction members as a high count is a strong symbol of great survival skills within The Zone. They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

Faction patches are often used to determine the rank of faction members as a high count is a strong symbol of great survival skills within The Zone. They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

Military flasks are used for small zips of water. Medics and scientist are boiling portions of zone water with a special type of alcohol at very high temperatures. After that it is cooled down for a refreshing spark. This process results in a limited supply offered to each stalker at a price. The water is a little more expensive at medics since they pay for using other peoples primitive or improvised power supplies. But the water is impossible to clean perfectly so a slight radiation and fatigue slowly generates a grainy vision and a decrease in stamina. Unless you throw a disinfecting Akvatab into the flask with every zip of water that you take in to neutralize this effect.

Small plastic bag with tablets for the use of zone water from wells, rivers and lakes all over The excluded Zone. Akvatabs tablets are intended for disinfecting water containing harmful bacteria and viruses.
An old metal shovel used for various field purposes. Few people actually keep shovels with them as they are a common found in The Zone. Especially around industrial areas.
Black military shovel of high quality used for numorous field purposes. Few people actually keep shovels with them as they are a common found in The Zone. Especially around industrial areas.
Improvised Explosive Device based on an RPG7 grenade and parts from a cars battery. It looks like it has been carried around for quite a while and could go off any second.
Improvised Explosive Device based on various chemical substances. It looks like it has been carried around for quite a while and could go off any second.

Adolf Hitlers strategic memoires gathered in a single book. The book and all that it stands for is hated by many making this an item og high symbolic value. Adolf Hitler (20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945) was an Austrian-born German politician and the leader of the National Socialist German Workers Party (German: Nationalsozialistische Deutsche Arbeiterpartei (NSDAP), commonly referred to as the Nazi Party). He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 and dictator of Nazi Germany (as Führer und Reichskanzler) from 1934 to 1945. Hitler was at the centre of the founding of Nazism, the start of World War II, and the Holocaust.
A handful of gold teeth in a small plastic jar filled with sand and leaves to make it silent when running with this special item.

Grooming kit that packs a ballistic nylon travel case with a beard & mustache comb and Detail Facial Scissors, constructed with man-sized finger rings, ultra-sharp Stainless Steel 420 cutting blades, non-slip rubberized grip, and a precision trimming tip.
Personal journal with a few primitive maps and notations in leather binding. Simple survival tips for the common man and not of much value.

Mapmaking kit containing a collection of pens and measurement instruments. All wrapped up in a rainproof and camouflaged cover of high quality. Some maps have been started on but not yet completed. Your pda is a much better tool than any of this.
Metal bottle containing a small portion of what seems to be zone produced vodka. It doesn't smell right and the fumes are strong.

Dead geiger counter that may have served its purpose. A Geiger counter is a type of particle detector that measures ionizing radiation. They detect the emission of nuclear radiation: alpha particles, beta particles or gamma rays. A Geiger counter detects radiation by ionization produced in a low-pressure gas in a tube. Invented in 1908, Geiger counters remain popular instruments used for measurements in health, physics, industry, geology and other fields, because they can be made with simple electronic circuits.

Old and corroted pair of welding goggles with a broken leather band. Welding goggles are designed to provide protection for certain types of gas welding or oxygen cuttinge. But these are useless in their current state and of little or no value now.
Survival kit containing some fabric, sewing needles and a few leather strips.
Small box of some womans jewelry. It seems rather valuable but these items are not very popular among stalkers as they indicate a simple raiders moral.

A field cooking travel kit for providing cooking accessories for use in camping and traveling situations. The field cooking travel kit comprises a plurality of cooking utensils. A noisy and large kit to carry for one person but very popular among larger groups of stalkers.
Book about mechanical engineering. Some people use these to investigate and learn more about the facilities and factories in The Zone. Not of much tradeable value.
Book about industrial engineering. Some people use these to investigate and learn more about the facilities and factories in The Zone. Not of much tradeable value.

This notebook describes various drug deals in detail. Specific nick names, locations and time of meeting. Some deals are executed through equipment exchanges and some deals are payed in large amounts of rubles. When running through the pages it becomes clear that Freedom faction are the main distributors of natural drugs like marihuana and plant substances. Bandits are producers and distributors of the more powerful (and dangerous) synthetic drugs like salicidic acid and cocaine. Apparently these drugs are being traded with every faction to some extent. Especially Monolith faction seems to be taking in large amounts drugs in exhange for the more expensive types of ammunition and equipment.
The small picture wrapped in plastic displays a beautiful woman with black hair. At the bottom of the picture a name is crossed out.
Small cases and various metal items form a kit for managing and producing drugs. Some plastic bags contain pills and herbs.
A pack of strong cigarettes with only a few left.
A light sleeping bag, that will keep you warm when you need to rest. Be sure to pick a safe spot with a possible escape route.

In The Zone you are most likely to be caught by surprise in terrible situations. With a QR-system you can unburden yourself in a matter of seconds and grant yourself the freedom of movement with low weight. The system is for your backpack. Place it as a hotkey item. Push the hotkey to activate the emergency release that instantly drops your backpack (and everything inside it) to free yourself from its weight. Your equipped weapon(s), ammunition, armour and armour attachments remain equipped so you are ready for fighting. Retrieve your backpack afterwards.

A whole bag full of hooks, knives and equipment for handling animals hides and meat. Few stalkers are carrying professional equipment for mutant hunting. That is probably the reason why most stalkers become sick after eating cooked mutant meals
A magazine full of glossy spreads of tattooed girls. A popular find among zone men that need a psychological espace on a daily basis.

Everyone knows about the importance of good gear. Having an extra set of boots is an extremely satisfying thing is a place like this. But many are lacking good gear so it is important to keep such items in the dark or at the bottom of your backpack.
The best tool for opening locked doors and entering buildings. A common find in the industrial areas but some stalkers are keeping a crowbar in their inventories in spite of its weight. Little value.

Cigarrettes are expensive and rare in The Zone. So having raw tobacco enables you to generate your own at a lower cost. But in these conditions it is almost impossible to ensure its quality for more than a few days. This box smells rotten.

One out of ten batteries found in Zaton and Jupiter still carry some juice. Stalkers seem to throw them everywhere when they run dead. It is almost impossible to find a battery recharger as some men would kill for such equipment.

Self-grown cannabis smoking is popular in this place and especially within the Freedom fighter faction. Such marijuana bags are traded here and there by the Freedom faction as they believe that the drug is a helpful tool for mind struggling to find its balance.
The light bulb is removed and the flashlight makes strange noises when being handled. There is little chance that this item is ever going to function again.
The handle is broken and not even duck tape would be able to keep the batteries in place. This is no longer of any value.
An extra pair of socks, shirt and underwear might work wonders. But not is this soaked and bloody condition. There is little chance that any stalker would pay for such spare clothes.

Spare parts for what looks to be an AKM assault rifle. The wooden parts are not in a very good condition and only novices would be interested in buying such weapon parts. There are stalkers who replace certain weapon parts when finding a new weapon out in the open. They do this to avoid the possibility of being hunted down for stash theft.

A comforting item that gives you that extra 10 percent chance of a night sleep. Few actual beds are found in the areas of Zaton and Jupiter so having a bed spread and a sleeping bag in your inventory is almost obligatory according to many stalker.
The display is dead and there is a constant hiss from the speaker indicating that this is of no use.

It is important to have your mindset focus on other things than the Chernobyl disaster and its consequenses. So a deck of cards are popular for killing time but also used for sorting special trades and other unsual matters. Moscow is depicted on these cards as a proud architectural design.

The smells of strong alcohol does not deceive the sovjet mind. This is russian vodka of high quality. It is often seen that drinks and liquids are carried in military containers to avoid a glass bottle from being destroyed.

Every stalker knows about the importance of reliable weaponry. That is the reason why a daily and thorough analysis of your ammunition is important also. Stalkers often count their ammo and clean it to perfection as a weapon jam in the heat of battle may cost your life. This ammo has a bad standard and should be discarded.
These maps indicate the location of military camps around the Zone. But everyone with a PDA has already marked these well known locations. So this is of little use to anyone with a functioning PDA.

Opening cans of food, keeping your mechanical gear tightened, cutting ropes and sparpening your best bullets. The swiss knife serves many purposes and it a powerful tool packed in a very little container. Many stalkers carry such tool so it may be of little value when traded.

Although few men dare to explore The Zone during the night there are circumstances where a head lamp is crucial. Everyone keeps some sort of light source close to him. You never know if you have to move from one place to another during the night if faction assaults are executed.
Small mirror mounted on a telescopic iron tube. A handy item used by those skilled in the arts of urban combat as it allows to peek around corners without getting shot.
A pack of C-cell batteries. Their outer layer of corrotion and dirt is a strong indication that these are dead.

Small aluminium case containing cocaine and the tools for its use. Cocaine is a powerful nervous system stimulant. Its effects can last from 15–30 minutes to an hour, depending on the route of administration. Cocaine increases alertness, feelings of well-being and euphoria, energy and motor activity, feelings of competence and sexuality. Athletic performance may be enhanced in sports where sustained attention and endurance is required. Anxiety, paranoia and restlessness are also frequent. With excessive dosage, tremors, convulsions and increased body temperature are observed. Occasional cocaine use does not typically lead to severe or even minor physical or social problems. Bandits are know for making use of such drugs right before launching an assault or ambush.

These wooden and iron hammers are a common sight in the industrial areas of The Zone. Although, they are counted for as heavy items for a backpack they are often saved in a stalkers inventory for their versatile use.

Tetanus vaccine is composed of inactivated tetanus toxin and is used to prevent an individual from contracting tetanus. Tetanus, also known as lockjaw, is a disease caused by the bacteria Clostridium tetani which enters the body through open wounds and releases a poison called tetanospasmin. This is a potentially deadly disease because the poison attacks the nervous system blocking nerve signals from the spinal cord to and from the muscles. Animals of the Zone have a high likehood of carrying the Teranus disease and it spreads easily through bites. As injection of inactivated toxin overally boosts users organism activity, there are several positive side-effects of usage can be experienced. Morever in this particular case the mixture has been enhanced by several additional anti-toxins making the vaccine usable beyond its original purpose.

A tarpauling (or hootch) is a large sheet of strong, flexible, water-resistant or waterproof material, often cloth such as canvas or polyester coated with urethane. Or made of plastics such as polyethylene. They often have reinforced grommets at the corners and along the sides to form attachment points for rope, allowing them to tied down or suspended between trees. A good tool for several purposes. It is mainly used for creating small and simple tent like hideouts for resting. Trading value is low as alternatives are found many places in industrial areas.
A good rope serves many purposes in a place such as this. Many stalkers can put this to good use which generates a rather high trading value. The length of this is about 10 meters.

Synthetic ropes are common items of military inventories. But for some reason few military stalkers actually carry them. A good rope serves many purposes in a place such as this. Many stalkers can put this to good use which generates a rather high trading value. The length of these ropes is about 5 meters each.

Spoon, knife and fork made of heavy steel form a robust and reasonably light cutlery set ideal for backpacking and field exploration trips. The cutlery is held together by a cord and stopper. If corrotion and dirt were to be cleaned off this set it could be safe to use.

Epinephrine (also known as adrenalin) is a hormone and a neurotransmitter. Epinephrine has many functions in the body, instantly regulating heart rate, blood vessel and air passage diameters, and metabolic shifts; epinephrine release is a crucial component of the fight-or-flight response of the sympathetic nervous system. The effects lead to increased blood glucose and fatty acids, providing substrates for instant energy production within cells throughout the body.
Music is a good way to calm your nerves. But with a broken antenna such as this there is little use of a radio such as this. Moisture and dirt has also damaged this item.
A small radio in poor condition with signs of moisture and dirt everywhere. The interiors seem to be damaged as the radio rattle when moved around. Little or no value.

A lightweight, strong and compact solid fuel stove supplied with two small Hexene fuel tabs. Hexi solid fuel tablets burn without odour and ignite easily with a match - 4 small fuel tablets will bring to the boil 2.5 cups of water in approximately 5 minutes. On opening the cooker, it can be used in several ways. The hinged openers can be angled to concentrate the heat to a pinpointed area, for direct heat, or, used at 90 deg angle for regular cooking, or the cooker can be inverted, (Spikes down) placing the fuel blocks closer to the mess tin. Whichever way you use it, the Hexi Cooker is a reliable field cooker that will never let you down. It will work in all weathers, and heat water and food quickly.
A light sleeping bag, that will keep you warm when you need to rest. Be sure to pick a safe spot with a possible escape route.

In The Zone you are most likely to be caught by surprise in terrible situations. With a QR-system you can unburden yourself in a matter of seconds and grant yourself the freedom of movement with low weight. The system is for your backpack. Place it as a hotkey item. Push the hotkey to activate the emergency release that instantly drops your backpack (and everything inside it) to free yourself from its weight. Your equipped weapon(s), ammunition, armour and armour attachments remain equipped so you are ready for fighting. Retrieve your backpack afterwards.

An extremely durable backpack with implemented GPS electronical devices. You will synchronize this device with your PDA once dropped to generate a stash that is marked on your PDA. The backpack is made of strong and durable materials that will keep your equipment safe and dry even in very humid environments. The camouflaged design makes sure that it doesn't stand out from the surroundings.

As a USS Assaulter you have unique strengths and weaknesses.

%c[255,238,153,26]EQUIPMENT
%c[default]Heavy armour agility: %c[255,230,150,30]A+
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Closed breathing agility: %c[255,230,150,30]C
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Artifact handling: %c[255,230,150,30]C

%c[255,238,153,26]WEAPONS
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Knife fighting: %c[255,230,150,30]A+
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Handling speciality: %c[255,230,150,30]High recoils
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Maintenance speciality: %c[255,230,150,30]Heavy weapons

%c[255,238,153,26]MEDICINE
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Bandages/medkits dexterity: %c[255,230,150,30]B
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Medic skills: %c[255,230,150,30]C
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Drug handling skills: %c[255,230,150,30]C

%c[255,238,153,26]ATHLETICS
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Endurance: %c[255,230,150,30]very high
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Sprinting speed: %c[255,230,150,30]slow
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Jump height: %c[255,230,150,30]low
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Fall/jump agility: %c[255,230,150,30]low
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Base stamina: %c[255,230,150,30]low
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Maximum carry weight: %c[255,230,150,30]high

%c[255,238,153,26]HEALTH PROFILE
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Food consumption rate: %c[255,230,150,30]high
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Need for sleep: %c[255,230,150,30]high

%c[255,238,153,26]IMMMUNE SYSTEM RESISTANCE
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Drugs/alcohol:%c[255,230,150,30]A+
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Unhealthy food: %c[255,230,150,30]B
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Artifacts: %c[255,230,150,30]C
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Radiation: %c[255,230,150,30]C

As a USS Recon you have unique strengths and weaknesses.

%c[255,238,153,26]EQUIPMENT
%c[default]Heavy armour agility: %c[255,230,150,30]C
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Closed breathing agility: %c[255,230,150,30]A+
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Artifact handling: %c[255,230,150,30]A+

%c[255,238,153,26]WEAPONS
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Knife fighting: %c[255,230,150,30]A
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Handling speciality: %c[255,230,150,30]SMG's
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Maintenance speciality: %c[255,230,150,30]SMG's

%c[255,238,153,26]MEDICINE
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Bandages/medkits dexterity: %c[255,230,150,30]A+
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Medic skills: %c[255,230,150,30]A
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Drug handling skills: %c[255,230,150,30]A

%c[255,238,153,26]ATHLETICS
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Endurance: %c[255,230,150,30]low
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Sprinting speed: %c[255,230,150,30]high
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Jump height: %c[255,230,150,30]high
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Fall/jump agility: %c[255,230,150,30]high
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Base stamina: %c[255,230,150,30]high
%c[255,238,153,26]%c[default]Maximum carry weight: %c[255,230,150,30]low

An iron ampoule designed as field equipment for military field personel for instant pain reduction. This ampoule contains a powerful dosis of Morphine. In clinical medicine, morphine is regarded as the gold standard, or benchmark, of opioid analgesics used to relieve severe or agonizing pain and suffering. Like other opioids, such as oxycodone, hydromorphone, and diacetylmorphine (heroin), morphine acts directly on the central nervous system (CNS) to relieve pain. Injected to arm or thigh.

An iron ampoule designed as field equipment for military field personel for instant pain reduction. This ampoule contains a powerful dosis of Salicylic acid. Salicylic acid is known for its ability to ease aches and pains and reduce fevers. These medicinal properties, particularly fever relief, have been known since ancient times, and it is used as an anti-inflammatory drug.Some researchers believe that salicylate is an essential micronutrient in the human diet, potentially qualifying as a vitamin, namely Vitamin S. Injected to arm or thigh.
Canned sliced and diced tomatoes are brought to the Zone on regular basis. The date on the bottom tells you that this should be alright to eat.
Made of beef and pork. Smoked and vacuum packaged it can be preserved for a long periods.
Canned sweet corn brought from the outside. Can be eaten as it is, but there are some who cook soup with it.
Spring water from the Ukrainian mountains with added carbohydrates and calcium.
Precious hand rolling tobacco which was brought from the west side. Since there are no additives with this brand, it is posible to enjoy the original taste of tobacco leaf itself.
Ukrainian beer. Not only vodka, but also beer is popular within every faction.
Canned baked beans brought from west. The kidney beans with tomato sauce may bring back some memories for some people in certain areas.
Canned chili beans brought from the outside are popular as incredients in cooked mutant meals.
Ukrainian smoked salmon. These valuable packages are often traded and consumed within a few days after they've been brought to the Zone.
A pack of raisins are a rich and instant nutrition source for balancing the sugar balance in the blood.
Russian chocolate. It is quite hard to obtain in the Zone though it is nothing special outside of the Zone.
Strong mint gum brough from the west. It is refreshing and seems to have a nice ability to fight off sleepiness for a short while.
Caffeine and sodium benzonate which cause action to occur central nervous excitation to get rid of sleepiness for a while.
The valuable Cuban cigar can assure a blissful moment during a nice sunset. Some Stalkers talk about the joy of not having mosquitos around you when smoking strong tobacco.
Cigarettes brought from the west. Some Stalkers use these packages to trade a few rounds of ammo within their faction.
The cheapest pack of cigarettes in the Zone. A russian budget brand.
Assorted peanuts, hazelnuts, cashews and almonds in a nice and popular blend. Nutrition value is quite high.
